mapper.select: select exam_category_tbl.code, exam_category_tbl.name, exam_category_tbl.score, exam_category_tbl.time, exam_category_tbl.pass_score, exam_category_compose_tbl.code as category_code, exam_category_compose_tbl.type, exam_category_compose_tbl.count from exam_category_tbl inner join exam_category_compose_tbl on exam_category_tbl.code = exam_category_compose_tbl.code where exam_category_tbl.code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select exam_category_tbl.code, exam_category_tbl.name, exam_category_tbl.score, exam_category_tbl.time, exam_category_tbl.pass_score, exam_category_compose_tbl.code as category_code, exam_category_compose_tbl.type, exam_category_compose_tbl.count from exam_category_tbl inner join exam_category_compose_tbl on exam_category_tbl.code = exam_category_compose_tbl.code
mapper.insert: insert into exam_category_tbl (code, name, score, time, pass_score) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passScore,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into exam_category_tbl
code,

score,

update exam_category_tbl

where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
